vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐξολεθρ-εύω,
destroy utterly, [LXX+NT+1st c.AD+] in this group of words is frequently in later codices and Papyrus, as [Refs 6th c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: (passive) to be completely cut off fromto destroy
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
(passive) to be completely cut off fromto destroy
to destroy utterly, root out, completely cut off Acts 3:23*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 滅絕, 斬草除根, 全部滅除 (徒 3:23)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 灭绝, 斩草除根, 全部灭除 (徒 3:23)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: bị truất khỏi; tiêu diệt. ἐκ (G1537) + ὀλοθρεύω (G3645)
